summary: Not that any of them are very lackluster in combat, but couldn't they be better?
descriptionHtml:
(Hearthfire Required BTW- This started as a fix for Gregor/Valdimar/Rayya anyway)

So while lurking on the UESP I found out that Valdimar is the only Housecarl to have any perks. I decided to change that. This just adds higher-level perks to your housecarls to make their fighting styles slightly more powerful and distinct from each other (ie weapon preferences), nothing else (Except for switching Gregor's class to CombatWarrior2H, which was probably intended). This also does not fix the issue with Valdimar's class preferring heavy armor rather than light armor, because I am very much a beginner with the CK and also there's many many many other fixes available for that.

Perks added are as follows:
[u][b]
All:

[/b][/u][list]
[*]Tower of Strength
[*]Juggernaut
[*]Matching Set
[*]Overdraw
[*]Power Shot
[/list]
[u][b]Jordis and Lydia (Swords and Shields):[/b][/u]

[list]
[*]Armsman
[*]Bladesman
[*]Shield Wall
[*]Deflect Arrows
[*]Elemental Protection
[/list]
[u][b]Iona and Calder (Axes and Shields):[/b][/u][list]
[*]Armsman
[*]Hack and Slash
[*]Shield Wall
[*]Deflect Arrows
[*]Elemental Protection
[/list][u][b]Argis (Maces and Shields):[/b][/u][list]
[*]Armsman
[*]Bone Breaker
[*]Shield Wall
[*]Deflect Arrows
[*]Elemental Protection
[/list][u][b]Gregor (Greatswords):

[/b][/u][list]
[*]Barbarian
[*]Deep Wounds
[/list][u][b]Rayya (Dual-Wielded Swords/Scimitars):

[/b][/u][list]
[*]Dual Flurry
[*]Armsman
[*]Bladesman
[/list]
